en.description: The Spectra Vandal is the Vandal variant of the Spectra Spectra laser beam sidearm, sporting increased damage, critical chance and status chance, magazine size, max ammo capacity, and faster reload speed.

ru.description: Инструмент-резак, созданный по спецзаказу мастеров-ремесленников Корпуса. Обладает особым азуритовым покрытием и фокусированным кристаллом великолепной огранки и чистоты.

ko.description: The Spectra Vandal is the Vandal variant of the Spectra Spectra laser beam sidearm, sporting increased damage, critical chance and status chance, magazine size, max ammo capacity, and faster reload speed.
